answer: RNG Key triggers a maximum of once per turn, when the Runner makes a successful run on either HQ or R&D.
question:
####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) [UFAQ 20](http://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Down_the_White_Nile_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
Does RNG Key trigger once for the first successful run on each of HQ and R&D, or does it trigger once the first time the Runner makes a successful run on either HQ or R&D?
